ayah: طسٓمٓ
ayah_translit: ta-seen-meem
ayah_english: Ta Seem Meem

ayah: تِلۡكَ ءَايَٰتُ ٱلۡكِتَٰبِ ٱلۡمُبِينِ
ayah_translit: til'ka ayatu al-kitabi al-mubini
ayah_english: These (are the) Verses (of) the Book clear

ayah: لَعَلَّكَ بَٰخِعٞ نَّفۡسَكَ أَلَّا يَكُونُواْ مُؤۡمِنِينَ
ayah_translit: la'allaka bakhi'un nafsaka alla yakunu mu'minina
ayah_english: Perhaps you (would) kill yourself that not they become believers

ayah: إِن نَّشَأۡ نُنَزِّلۡ عَلَيۡهِم مِّنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ ءَايَةٗ فَظَلَّتۡ أَعۡنَٰقُهُمۡ لَهَا خَٰضِعِينَ
ayah_translit: in nasha nunazzil alayhim mina al-samai ayatan fazallat a'naquhum laha khadi'ina
ayah_english: If We will We can send down to them from the sky a Sign so would bend their necks to it (in) humility

ayah: وَمَا يَأۡتِيهِم مِّن ذِكۡرٖ مِّنَ ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنِ مُحۡدَثٍ إِلَّا كَانُواْ عَنۡهُ مُعۡرِضِينَ
ayah_translit: wama yatihim min dhik'rin mina al-rahmani muh'dathin illa kanu anhu mu'ridina
ayah_english: And (does) not come to them any reminder from the Most Gracious new but they from it turn away

ayah: فَقَدۡ كَذَّبُواْ فَسَيَأۡتِيهِمۡ أَنۢبَـٰٓؤُاْ مَا كَانُواْ بِهِۦ يَسۡتَهۡزِءُونَ
ayah_translit: faqad kadhabu fasayatihim anbau ma kanu bihi yastahziuna
ayah_english: So verily they have denied then will come to them the news (of) what they used at it (to) mock

ayah: فَقَدۡ كَذَّبُواْ فَسَيَأۡتِيهِمۡ أَنۢبَـٰٓؤُاْ مَا كَانُواْ بِهِۦ يَسۡتَهۡزِءُونَ

ayah: أَوَلَمۡ يَرَوۡاْ إِلَى ٱلۡأَرۡضِ كَمۡ أَنۢبَتۡنَا فِيهَا مِن كُلِّ زَوۡجٖ كَرِيمٍ
ayah_translit: awalam yaraw ila al-ardi kam anbatna fiha min kulli zawjin karimin
ayah_english: Do not they see at the earth how many We produced in it of every kind noble

ayah: أَوَلَمۡ يَرَوۡاْ إِلَى ٱلۡأَرۡضِ كَمۡ أَنۢبَتۡنَا فِيهَا مِن كُلِّ زَوۡجٖ كَرِيمٍ

ayah_english: [That] send with us the children (of Israel) (the children) of Israel

ayah: قَالَ أَلَمۡ نُرَبِّكَ فِينَا وَلِيدٗا وَلَبِثۡتَ فِينَا مِنۡ عُمُرِكَ سِنِينَ
ayah_translit: qala alam nurabbika fina walidan walabith'ta fina min umurika sinina
ayah_english: He said Did not we bring you up among us (as) a child and you remained among us of your life years

ayah: فَفَرَرۡتُ مِنكُمۡ لَمَّا خِفۡتُكُمۡ فَوَهَبَ لِي رَبِّي حُكۡمٗا وَجَعَلَنِي مِنَ ٱلۡمُرۡسَلِينَ
ayah_translit: fafarartu minkum lamma khif'tukum fawahaba li rabbi huk'man waja'alani mina al-mur'salina
ayah_english: So I fled from you when I feared you But granted to me my Lord judgment and made me of the Messengers

ayah: وَتِلۡكَ نِعۡمَةٞ تَمُنُّهَا عَلَيَّ أَنۡ عَبَّدتَّ بَنِيٓ إِسۡرَـٰٓءِيلَ
ayah_translit: watil'ka ni'matun tamunnuha alayya an abbadtta bani is'raila
ayah_english: And this (is the) favor with which you reproach [on] me that you have enslaved (the) Children of Israel (the) Children of Israel

ayah_translit: qala fir'awnu wama rabbu al-'alamina
ayah_english: Firaun said Firaun said And what (is the) Lord (of) the worlds

ayah: قَالَ رَبُّ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَمَا بَيۡنَهُمَآۖ إِن كُنتُم مُّوقِنِينَ
ayah_translit: qala rabbu al-samawati wal-ardi wama baynahuma in kuntum muqinina
ayah_english: He said Lord (of) the heavens and the earth and whatever (is) between them if you (should) be convinced

ayah_translit: la'allana nattabi'u al-saharata in kanu humu al-ghalibina
ayah_english: That we may follow the magicians if they are they are the victorious

ayah: فَلَمَّا جَآءَ ٱلسَّحَرَةُ قَالُواْ لِفِرۡعَوۡنَ أَئِنَّ لَنَا لَأَجۡرًا إِن كُنَّا نَحۡنُ ٱلۡغَٰلِبِينَ
ayah_translit: falamma jaa al-saharatu qalu lifir'awna a-inna lana la-ajran in kunna nahnu al-ghalibina
ayah_english: So when came the magicians they said to Firaun Is there for us a reward if we are we are the victorious

ayah: قَالَ نَعَمۡ وَإِنَّكُمۡ إِذٗا لَّمِنَ ٱلۡمُقَرَّبِينَ
ayah_translit: qala na'am wa-innakum idhan lamina al-muqarabina
ayah_english: He said Yes and indeed you then surely (will be) of the ones who are brought near

ayah: قَالَ لَهُم مُّوسَىٰٓ أَلۡقُواْ مَآ أَنتُم مُّلۡقُونَ
ayah_translit: qala lahum musa alqu ma antum mul'quna
ayah_english: Said to them Musa Throw what you (are) going to throw

ayah: فَأَلۡقَوۡاْ حِبَالَهُمۡ وَعِصِيَّهُمۡ وَقَالُواْ بِعِزَّةِ فِرۡعَوۡنَ إِنَّا لَنَحۡنُ ٱلۡغَٰلِبُونَ
ayah_translit: fa-alqaw hibalahum wa'isiyyahum waqalu bi'izzati fir'awna inna lanahnu al-ghalibuna
ayah_english: So they threw their ropes and their staffs and said By the might (of) Firaun indeed we surely we (are) the victorious

ayah: فَأَلۡقَىٰ مُوسَىٰ عَصَاهُ فَإِذَا هِيَ تَلۡقَفُ مَا يَأۡفِكُونَ
ayah_translit: fa-alqa musa asahu fa-idha hiya talqafu ma yafikuna
ayah_english: Then threw Musa his staff and behold! It swallowed what they falsified

ayah_translit: fa-ul'qiya al-saharatu sajidina
ayah_english: Then fell down the magicians prostrate

ayah: فَأُلۡقِيَ ٱلسَّحَرَةُ سَٰجِدِينَ
ayah_translit: fa-ul'qiya al-saharatu sajidina

ayah: قَالُوٓاْ ءَامَنَّا بِرَبِّ ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ
ayah_translit: qalu amanna birabbi al-'alamina
ayah_english: They said We believe in (the) Lord (of) the worlds

ayah: رَبِّ مُوسَىٰ وَهَٰرُونَ
ayah_translit: rabbi musa waharuna
ayah_english: Lord (of) Musa and Harun

ayah: رَبِّ مُوسَىٰ وَهَٰرُونَ
ayah_translit: rabbi musa waharuna
ayah_english: Lord (of) Musa and Harun

ayah: رَبِّ مُوسَىٰ وَهَٰرُونَ
ayah_translit: rabbi musa waharuna
ayah_english: Lord (of) Musa and Harun

ayah: قَالَ ءَامَنتُمۡ لَهُۥ قَبۡلَ أَنۡ ءَاذَنَ لَكُمۡۖ إِنَّهُۥ لَكَبِيرُكُمُ ٱلَّذِي عَلَّمَكُمُ ٱلسِّحۡرَ فَلَسَوۡفَ تَعۡلَمُونَۚ لَأُقَطِّعَنَّ أَيۡدِيَكُمۡ وَأَرۡجُلَكُم مِّنۡ خِلَٰفٖ وَلَأُصَلِّبَنَّكُمۡ أَجۡمَعِينَ
ayah_translit: qala amantum lahu qabla an adhana lakum innahu lakabirukumu alladhi allamakumu al-sih'ra falasawfa ta'lamuna la-uqatti'anna aydiyakum wa-arjulakum min khilafin wala-usallibannakum ajma'ina
ayah_english: He said You believed in him before [that] I gave permission to you Indeed he (is) surely your chief who has taught you the magic so surely soon you will know I will surely cut off your hands and your feet of opposite sides and I will surely crucify you all

ayah: قَالَ ءَامَنتُمۡ لَهُۥ قَبۡلَ أَنۡ ءَاذَنَ لَكُمۡۖ إِنَّهُۥ لَكَبِيرُكُمُ ٱلَّذِي عَلَّمَكُمُ ٱلسِّحۡرَ فَلَسَوۡفَ تَعۡلَمُونَۚ لَأُقَطِّعَنَّ أَيۡدِيَكُمۡ وَأَرۡجُلَكُم مِّنۡ خِلَٰفٖ وَلَأُصَلِّبَنَّكُمۡ أَجۡمَعِينَ

ayah: قَالَ ءَامَنتُمۡ لَهُۥ قَبۡلَ أَنۡ ءَاذَنَ لَكُمۡۖ إِنَّهُۥ لَكَبِيرُكُمُ ٱلَّذِي عَلَّمَكُمُ ٱلسِّحۡرَ فَلَسَوۡفَ تَعۡلَمُونَۚ لَأُقَطِّعَنَّ أَيۡدِيَكُمۡ وَأَرۡجُلَكُم مِّنۡ خِلَٰفٖ وَلَأُصَلِّبَنَّكُمۡ أَجۡمَعِينَ
ayah_translit: qala amantum lahu qabla an adhana lakum innahu lakabirukumu alladhi allamakumu al-sih'ra falasawfa ta'lamuna la-uqatti'anna aydiyakum wa-arjulakum min khilafin wala-usallibannakum ajma'ina
ayah_english: He said You believed in him before [that] I gave permission to you Indeed he (is) surely your chief who has taught you the magic so surely soon you will know I will surely cut off your hands and your feet of opposite sides and I will surely crucify you all

ayah: قَالَ ءَامَنتُمۡ لَهُۥ قَبۡلَ أَنۡ ءَاذَنَ لَكُمۡۖ إِنَّهُۥ لَكَبِيرُكُمُ ٱلَّذِي عَلَّمَكُمُ ٱلسِّحۡرَ فَلَسَوۡفَ تَعۡلَمُونَۚ لَأُقَطِّعَنَّ أَيۡدِيَكُمۡ وَأَرۡجُلَكُم مِّنۡ خِلَٰفٖ وَلَأُصَلِّبَنَّكُمۡ أَجۡمَعِينَ

ayah_english: He said You believed in him before [that] I gave permission to you Indeed he (is) surely your chief who has taught you the magic so surely soon you will know I will surely cut off your hands and your feet of opposite sides and I will surely crucify you all

ayah: قَالُواْ لَا ضَيۡرَۖ إِنَّآ إِلَىٰ رَبِّنَا مُنقَلِبُونَ
ayah_translit: qalu la dayra inna ila rabbina munqalibuna
ayah_english: They said No harm Indeed we to our Lord (will) return

ayah: إِنَّا نَطۡمَعُ أَن يَغۡفِرَ لَنَا رَبُّنَا خَطَٰيَٰنَآ أَن كُنَّآ أَوَّلَ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ
ayah_translit: inna natma'u an yaghfira lana rabbuna khatayana an kunna awwala al-mu'minina
ayah_english: Indeed we hope that will forgive us our Lord our sins because we are (the) first (of) the believers

ayah_english: Indeed we hope that will forgive us our Lord our sins because we are (the) first (of) the believers

ayah: ۞وَأَوۡحَيۡنَآ إِلَىٰ مُوسَىٰٓ أَنۡ أَسۡرِ بِعِبَادِيٓ إِنَّكُم مُّتَّبَعُونَ
ayah_translit: wa-awhayna ila musa an asri bi'ibadi innakum muttaba'una
ayah_english: And We inspired to Musa [that] Travel by night with My slaves indeed you (will be) followed

ayah_translit: fa-arsala fir'awnu fi al-madaini hashirina
ayah_english: Then sent Firaun in the cities gatherers

ayah_translit: inna haulai lashir'dhimatun qaliluna
ayah_english: Indeed these (are) certainly a band small

ayah: فَأَتۡبَعُوهُم مُّشۡرِقِينَ
ayah_translit: fa-atba'uhum mush'riqina
ayah_english: So they followed them (at) sunrise

ayah: فَأَتۡبَعُوهُم مُّشۡرِقِينَ

ayah: فَلَمَّا تَرَـٰٓءَا ٱلۡجَمۡعَانِ قَالَ أَصۡحَٰبُ مُوسَىٰٓ إِنَّا لَمُدۡرَكُونَ
ayah_translit: falamma taraa al-jam'ani qala ashabu musa inna lamud'rakuna
ayah_english: Then when saw each other the two hosts said (the) companions (of) Musa Indeed we (are) surely to be overtaken

ayah: فَأَوۡحَيۡنَآ إِلَىٰ مُوسَىٰٓ أَنِ ٱضۡرِب بِّعَصَاكَ ٱلۡبَحۡرَۖ فَٱنفَلَقَ فَكَانَ كُلُّ فِرۡقٖ كَٱلطَّوۡدِ ٱلۡعَظِيمِ
ayah_translit: fa-awhayna ila musa ani id'rib bi'asaka al-bahra fa-infalaqa fakana kullu fir'qin kal-tawdi al-'azimi
ayah_english: Then We inspired to Musa [that] Strike with your staff the sea So it parted and became each part like the mountain [the] great

ayah: فَٱفۡتَحۡ بَيۡنِي وَبَيۡنَهُمۡ فَتۡحٗا وَنَجِّنِي وَمَن مَّعِيَ مِنَ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ

ayah: فَٱفۡتَحۡ بَيۡنِي وَبَيۡنَهُمۡ فَتۡحٗا وَنَجِّنِي وَمَن مَّعِيَ مِنَ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ

ayah: فَأَنجَيۡنَٰهُ وَمَن مَّعَهُۥ فِي ٱلۡفُلۡكِ ٱلۡمَشۡحُونِ
ayah_translit: fa-anjaynahu waman ma'ahu fi al-ful'ki al-mashhuni

ayah_translit: fakadhabuhu fa-ahlaknahum inna fi dhalika laayatan wama kana aktharuhum mu'minina

ayah: قَالَ هَٰذِهِۦ نَاقَةٞ لَّهَا شِرۡبٞ وَلَكُمۡ شِرۡبُ يَوۡمٖ مَّعۡلُومٖ
ayah_translit: qala hadhihi naqatun laha shir'bun walakum shir'bu yawmin ma'lumin
ayah_english: He said This (is) a she-camel For her (is a share of) drink and for you (is a share of) drink (on) a day known

ayah: وَلَا تَمَسُّوهَا بِسُوٓءٖ فَيَأۡخُذَكُمۡ عَذَابُ يَوۡمٍ عَظِيمٖ
ayah_translit: wala tamassuha bisuin fayakhudhakum adhabu yawmin azimin
ayah_english: And (do) not touch her with harm lest seize you (the) punishment (of) a Day Great

ayah: وَمَآ أَسۡـَٔلُكُمۡ عَلَيۡهِ مِنۡ أَجۡرٍۖ إِنۡ أَجۡرِيَ إِلَّا عَلَىٰ رَبِّ ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ
ayah_translit: wama asalukum alayhi min ajrin in ajriya illa ala rabbi al-'alamina
ayah_english: And not I ask (of) you for it any payment Not (is) my payment except from (the) Lord (of) the worlds

ayah: وَلَا تَبۡخَسُواْ ٱلنَّاسَ أَشۡيَآءَهُمۡ وَلَا تَعۡثَوۡاْ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ مُفۡسِدِينَ
ayah_translit: wala tabkhasu al-nasa ashyaahum wala ta'thaw fi al-ardi muf'sidina
ayah_english: And (do) not deprive people (of) their things and (do) not commit evil in the earth spreading corruption

ayah: وَمَآ أَنتَ إِلَّا بَشَرٞ مِّثۡلُنَا وَإِن نَّظُنُّكَ لَمِنَ ٱلۡكَٰذِبِينَ
ayah_translit: wama anta illa basharun mith'luna wa-in nazunnuka lamina al-kadhibina
ayah_english: And not you (are) except a man like us and indeed we think you surely (are) of the liars

ayah: إِلَّا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَٰتِ وَذَكَرُواْ ٱللَّهَ كَثِيرٗا وَٱنتَصَرُواْ مِنۢ بَعۡدِ مَا ظُلِمُواْۗ وَسَيَعۡلَمُ ٱلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُوٓاْ أَيَّ مُنقَلَبٖ يَنقَلِبُونَ
ayah_translit: illa alladhina amanu wa'amilu al-salihati wadhakaru al-laha kathiran wa-intasaru min ba'di ma zulimu wasaya'lamu alladhina zalamu ayya munqalabin yanqalibuna
ayah_english: Except those who believe and do righteous deeds and remember Allah much and defend themselves after after after they were wronged And will come to know those who have wronged (to) what return they will return

ayah_translit: illa alladhina amanu wa'amilu al-salihati wadhakaru al-laha kathiran wa-intasaru min ba'di ma zulimu wasaya'lamu alladhina zalamu ayya munqalabin yanqalibuna
ayah_english: Except those who believe and do righteous deeds and remember Allah much and defend themselves after after after they were wronged And will come to know those who have wronged (to) what return they will return
